name: Pong (itch) (sgstudio)
description:
Early Acess

Pong is a game that brings back the old 8-bit games of fun that marked the beginning of the games.

New features on update 0.7.0:

- Now, when your score 10 or more the scene change

- Improved the pause menu

To play:

- Use W or Up key to up the player

- Use S or Down key to down the player

- Use Space bar or left click to throw the ball

- Use Esc key to go to Pause menu

You can modify the game difficulty from easy, medium and hard (on medium difficulty will now be almost impossible to beat your opponent, imagine on the hard difficulty ;) )

Currently the game is in development and many features are coming. That number that looks like a 7 is actually a 1, but the font style is a bit like a 7.

Features that will be implemented:

- Create special bonuses to let the game more fun

- Create a World Cup mode

- Create a multiplayer option (we MAYBE implement this, because first we need players, if we have no players we don't have a multiplayer :( )

- And much more (which will be described here when we complete the features above)


Feel free to enter our comment page and give your suggestions, bug's report and more
